'''Collei''' is an upcoming [[Dendro]] character in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''. She has appeared in the official [[Manga]] and serves as one of its main characters.

Her quest for vengeance against [[Barnabas]], an agent of the [[Fatui]], is one of the driving forces behind the manga's main story.
